FinishText: Wherever you go, I will be by your side, in the warmth of the sunlight, in the comfort of the night breeze... like an unfaltering shadow.
Hint: ['① Wherever You Go', '② By Your Side', '③ Sunlight', '④ Night Breeze', '⑤ Shadow']

FinishText: As long as everyone and you get to live, that will be the greatest proof that I, Liv of Gray Raven,\nhave stood and fought until my very last breath.
Hint: ['① Everyone', '② Get to Live', '③ The Greatest Proof', '④ Liv', '⑤ stood and fought']

FinishText: To reclaim Earth, to go home... BPN08, you are our only hope.
Hint: ['① Earth', '② Home', '③ BPN-08', '④ You', '⑤ Only Hope']
